# Spunk.Bet — Free Crypto Casino

> Free-to-play crypto casino powered by SPUNK•BET runes on Bitcoin. 10 provably fair games, daily free runes, ordinal prizes, zero fees. No deposit required.


Spunk.Bet is a free-to-play crypto casino built on Bitcoin. Players receive 10,000 free SPUNK•BET runes daily from the faucet and can play 10 provably fair games including Dice, Coinflip, Crash, Mines, Plinko, Slots, Wheel, Keno, Blackjack, and Tower. All games are instant with no deposits, no fees, and no KYC. Win ordinal NFT prizes in tournaments. Share wins on X for bonus SPUNK.

## Games Available

- **Dice**: Roll over/under a target number. Adjustable odds from 2x to 99x.
- **Coinflip**: Heads or tails. 50/50 odds, 1.98x payout.
- **Crash**: Watch the multiplier rise. Cash out before it crashes.
- **Mines**: Reveal gems, avoid mines. More risk = bigger multiplier.
- **Plinko**: Drop a ball through pegs. Land on multipliers up to 1000x.
- **Slots**: Spin the reels. Match symbols for payouts up to 500x.
- **Wheel**: Spin the wheel. Land on multipliers from 1.5x to 50x.
- **Keno**: Pick numbers, match draws. Up to 10 selections.
- **Blackjack**: Classic 21. Beat the dealer with strategy.
- **Tower**: Climb the tower choosing safe tiles. Higher = bigger payout.
